definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail

sentences.english: Obviously, I thought, he hasn't forgotten the mud-throwing incident from over a year ago.
sentences.chinese: 我想他显然没有忘记一年多前我向他扔泥巴那件事。

sentences.english: You thanked her by plopping into the nearest pile of mud.
sentences.chinese: 你报答她，扑通一声摔进旁边一堆泥巴里。

sentences.english: That child packed up mud dough with a piece of paper.
sentences.chinese: 那小孩将一团泥巴用纸片包起来。

sentences.english: All the colors were running together and becoming mud brown!
sentences.chinese: 所有的颜色都跑一块儿，变成泥巴一般的棕色了。

sentences.english: It’s dusk and that part of the river’s just mud and an old barge.
sentences.chinese: 天已经黄昏，而那里除了泥巴外，只有一条老驳船。

sentences.english: But I'm gonna get that jumpe dup mudblood! Mark my words.
sentences.chinese: 但是我会给那个泥巴种好看的，记住我的话。

sentences.english: Bob's father gets after him for tracking mud into the house.
sentences.chinese: 鲍波把泥巴踩进屋里被父亲责骂。

sentences.english: I see a truck coming down the dirt road.
sentences.chinese: 我看到一辆卡车从泥巴路上开过来。

sentences.english: I mean not just windows shattered, or, you know, mud on the walls.
sentences.chinese: 我是指，不仅仅窗户破碎或者满壁泥巴。

sentences.english: When complete with the bath, wash off the remaining mud with a washcloth in the shower and finish with a salt scrub.
sentences.chinese: 当完成沐浴后，洗掉剩下的泥巴，以一个盐摩砂结束。

sentences.english: The group claimed a patch of mud on the rim of a slope.
sentences.chinese: 这群人在斜坡的边上占下了一片泥巴地。

sentences.english: Now hit the mud with your open hand.
sentences.chinese: 现在用你张开的手拍打泥巴。

sentences.english: The mud on your shoulder, you know.
sentences.chinese: 你的肩膀上有一块泥巴，晓得吧？

sentences.english: There were mud marks on Roo's shirt.
sentences.chinese: 小豆的衣服上有些泥巴的污点。

sentences.english: The dermatitis palastaie limosae, or “muddy wrestling rash”, may have been caused by manure-tainted mud.
sentences.chinese: 泥地摔跤皮疹可能是由于泥巴被肥料污染导致的。

sentences.english: And the clay that fills your ears shall be pierced by those fingers that kneaded it.
sentences.chinese: 堵塞你们耳道的泥巴，将由揉捏它的手指穿透。

definition: loess (yellow sandy soil typical of north China)
human excrement/night soil (human manure traditionally used as agricultural fertilizer)
